Pages.Title: Financial health

Questions.Label: Upload your accounts
Questions.Hint: The PDF file must be smaller than 5MB

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Select a file containing your accounts

Validations.Name: FileType
Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Questions.Label: Upload your parent company's accounts (optional)
Questions.Hint: If you have a parent company, upload your parent company's statutory accounts. The PDF file must be smaller than 5MB.

Validations.Name: FileType
Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Pages.BodyText:
If you have been trading for more than 12 months, upload your last financial years' statutory accounts and your parent company's accounts (if you have a parent company).

If you have been trading for less than 12 months, upload your management accounts.

Details.Title: Help with accounts
Details.Body:
Sole trader and partnerships

Trading for more than 12 months

  • submit management accounts (profit and loss or income and expenditure account, balance sheet and relevant notes to the accounts)

Trading for more than 3 months but less than 12

  • submit management accounts and a forecast for your first 12 months of trading

All other organisations

Trading for more than 12 months

  • submit your full statutory accounts including notes

Trading for more than 3 months but less than 12

  • submit management accounts and a forecast for your first 12 months of trading

Subsidiary organisation

Trading for more than 12 months

  • submit your parent company's statutory accounts and your statutory accounts

Trading for more than 3 months but less than 12

  • submit your parent company's statutory accounts, your management accounts and a forecast for your first 12 months of trading
